mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from point WHERE guest_no = #{guest_no}

select p.date, h.hotel_name, p.io_point, p.pointtype from hotel h join reserv r on h.hotel_no = r.hotel_no and r.guest_no=#{guest_no} join point p on (p.date = r.canceldate or p.date = r.rev_date) ORDER BY rev_date DESC limit ${startIdx}, ${pageRow}
select totalpoint from point where guest_no = #{guest_no} order by point_no desc limit 1
